duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure customers receive a high level of service consistent with the campground's customer service philosophy.
Learn and operate Campground Management system to help guests reserve and register for their camping experience in person and via telephone.
Communicate with all staff and management using Microsoft Teams.
Enforce campground policies and implement solutions consistent with park goals.
Proactively manage guests to ensure a positive environment for all.
Coordinate with Guest Service staff for late guest arrivals and problem resolution.
Facilitate guest ticket purchases for area attractions and cashier souvenir sales as well as stocking merchandise.
Utilize creative problem-solving skills and help facilitate day use passes for mountain biking guests.
Perform other duties as assigned by the manager to ensure the operations of the campground and guest satisfaction.
